name: Grungo kill shoot
description:
The original Grungo prototype! Made for a wwu game jam in 48 hours, it has since spawned many memes, fanart, game related stuff, and more!

Kill as many enemies as you can within the allotted time or die trying. WASD to move, lmb to shoot, shift to look further. The map is the same every time so that you can plan routes and go for a high score. 

If you manage to get a high score over 1000, you are a grungod. I respect you.
